message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its unique features and benefits are unparalleled in the market. To ensure you have the opportunity to experience its excellence, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the information about the product.  While I'm very interested,  $950000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'd be willing to pay $800000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and would like to propose a revised offer. We are willing to consider $850000 as a potential price for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between our initial proposal and your counteroffer. Please let us know if this is acceptable, and we'll work towards finalizing the details.
